com.redhat.rhn.manager.ssm
Class SsmOperationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.redhat.rhn.manager.BaseManager
      com.redhat.rhn.manager.ssm.SsmOperationManager

public class SsmOperationManager
extends BaseManager

Handles the tracking of SSM asynchronous operations, providing functionality for the creation, update, and retrieval of the data.

Parameters:

OperationsDto given an operation id or null.

createOperation

public static long createOperation(User user,
                                   java.lang.String description,
                                   java.lang.String rhnSetLabel)
Creates a new operation, defaulting the status to "in progress".

For efficiency, this call assumes the following:

  • The set of servers that are taking place in the operation are already in the database as an RhnSet (the name of set is passed into this call).
  • The server ID is stored in the first element (i.e. "element" in the set table).

This should be a safe assumption since, at very least, if all servers are taking place in the operation they are already in the SSM RhnSet. If only a subset is needed, a nested select can be used to drop them into a new set, preventing the need to have another insert per server for this call.

Parameters:
user - user under which to associate the operation; cannot be null
description - high level description of what the operation is doing; cannot be null
rhnSetLabel - references a RhnSet with the server IDs to associate with the new operation; if this is null no mappings will be created at this time
Returns:
the id of the created operation

completeOperation

public static void completeOperation(User user,
                                     long operationId)
Indicates the operation has completed, updating its status to indicate this.

Parameters:
user - verifies that the user isn't trying to load someone else's operation; cannot be null
operationId - database ID of the operation to update

findServerDataForOperation

public static DataResult findServerDataForOperation(long operationId)
Returns a list of servers that took part in the given SSM operation.

Parameters:
operationId - operation for which to return the server IDs
Returns:
list of maps, one per server ID, where each map contains a single entry (key: server_id) containing the server ID

associateServersWithOperation

public static void associateServersWithOperation(long operationId,
                                                 long userId,
                                                 java.lang.String setLabel)
Associates an operation with a group of servers against which it was run, where the servers are found in an RhnSet. The IDs for these servers must be stored in the "element" field of the RhnSet.

Parameters:
operationId - identifies an existing operation to associate with servers
userId - identifies the user performing the operation
setLabel - identifies the set in which to find server IDs

associateServersWithOperation

public static void associateServersWithOperation(long operationId,
                                                 long userId,
                                                 java.util.List<java.lang.Long> sidsIn)
Associates an operation with a group of servers against which it was run, where a list of server ids are passed in

Parameters:
operationId - identifies an existing operation to associate with servers
userId - identifies the user performing the operation
sidsIn - the list server ids
